dead by daylight yyds!

indeed a game that horrors you. 
unexpected appearances, accusations of lagg because you cant handle being ripped apart by a skilled killer, huge monstrosities you cant run away from, and most of all, original sounds if the killer is nearby, if i knew about horror movies better, id say this is the combination of its core. truely reflecting the skill sets of the killer and survivor characters

The game repeatedly made me play it because of whatever anniversary event i see, unlocking time and event limited cosmetics is kinda fun as a goal, but in general i dont like the idea of a rift/season pass, forcing you to play 6h a day to actually unlock everything and if you dont, youll never get the cosmetics of the last few levels of that pass ever again. its really frustrating. Id rather play for something like achievements, where the outcome of a specific event isnt necessarily having an impact on my general goal. Time limits reduce replayability once you couldnt manage to finish them.

O jogo é bom se você joga com amigos, ai gera umas risadas e pá. O problema é a atitude de alguns players, tanto killers quanto survivors. Alguns Killers fazem  face camping e tunneling acabando com a partida, por que tu fica 100 anos na porra do loading por conta dos caras que jogam essa merda de jogo no mobile, quando finalmente carrega o cara faz uma merda dessa e o jogo dura para você tipo 2 minutos, sendo que 1:30 você ficou na porra do gancho. A behavour não faz nada para esse tipo de comportamento por que para eles isso não é um tipo de conduta anti-esportiva então pau no seu anus se você não gostar, se for comprar tenha isso em mente. 

Para killer o jogo acaba sendo mais divertido. Você tem que entender da mecânica do boneco e também se adaptar na partida, patrulhando geradores, tomando cuidado com o tempo de perseguição e também tentando levar os survivors para um canto especifico do mapa caso eles decidam fazer um "gen rush", assim você deixa os geradores mais próximos um do outro e fica mais fácil de não terminar o jogo com eles fugindo.

Conclusão, se tu quer comprar esse jogo para jogar sozinho, não recomendo a menos que for para jogar de killer, caso for para jogar de survivor, jogue com algum grupo de amigos, por que a comunicação dentro do jogo é nula e isso dificulta para caralho você montar uma estrategia sendo que é um jogo onde você joga em TIME e não tem como se comunicar.... Tudo bem, tudo bem, tu pode fazer 2 gestos: Apontar para algo, chamar com a mão.

好玩，团队游戏

Edit: If you are willing to "grind the game out," wait for long killer queues, or play with friends, you will have fun. If you are NOT willing to do those things, find something else. (Also a lot of "meta" perks and stuff are locked behind pay walls, and only 1 perk per DLC is typically relevant.) The game starts to get good at around hour 20. So we got some MMO syndrome over here where the only "good content" is late game, making the experience for new players really bad.

Original Review

Queue times for killer are too long. Survivor gameplay is a mixed bag of feelings. Character "power level" and "usefulness" out of the box is all over the place. The game's recent colorblind mode made the game finally playable in a lot of ways, where in the past I couldn't even SEE on most maps due to black on black color scheme that couldn't be changed, but the lack of sound options or video options, as a whole, still make things way too difficult to see or hear. I understand that not letting me raise the gamma makes it more "fair" but I also can't actually see due to my own color issues.

Sometimes I play with friends and have a bit of fun, but the core gameplay loop doesn't engage me enough to recommend it to others. I could probably enjoy the killer gameplay a bit more but the wait times for a game are way too long for so little pay off.

I didn't think I would make a review this soon about this game. If you read this review and think I am a hypocrite because I have a 1000 hours in this game, please here me out. I got a few reasons why I put a negative review in this game. Don't get me wrong I love this game and I started to recently play it again.

[h1] My reasons why I am not happy with (My opinion) [/h1]

I play both survivor and killer, but you can honestly tell from playing both sides that it is so Survivor-sided. Keys are still broken in this game. recent nerfs to decisive strike that didn't needed to be changed, it was a good perk the way it was before. The matchmaking system is broken as well, some matches you will get survivors who don't know how to do the objective and heal survivors. And sometimes you get asshole killers, not always, but sometimes.

As killer.... well recently when I played when the anniversary update came out, I had 2 games where hackers had unlimited sprint burst and being toxic. As well as if you do anything that the survivors don't like, you will get salty comments at the post chat. The community is toxic, so be very patient and hard-headed if you really want to play this game as killer. Moris and some perks have been nerfed badly for killers. 



Those are my reasons, a short review of what i feel about it. I still love this game

This game is freaking incredible. So many of my favorite moments of the past year+ (and all the terribleness that came with it) occurred while playing this game with friends or playing killer on stream. It's a fantastic game to play with some friends trying to survive casually, but also very deep with all the different characters, perks, abilities and addons that you can choose to affect the game. I have very rapidly become addicted to this game and this community, and I'm sure you will too. If you don't want to sink hundred of hours into a game that is an insane amount of fun, then don't get it. If that sounds good, then play it.

TL;DR - Incredible game, you should play it, but also don't cause you'll be addicted like me ;)

This game uses the EAC (easy anti cheat) client. This client will crash your PC when you run the game if it doesn't like some unknown settings in your windows PC. Customer service is unable to fix this issue for you and tries to pass you off to EAC customer support which never responds. 

Save your money until they fix this.

該怎麼說呢，如果你想當鬼，請做好被人欺負的準備，鬼的重要技能幾乎都無法在人的手上活下來，未來技能還有可能繼續削弱，想玩的鬼要做好心理準備

如果你想當人，恭喜你，現在的人都是惡魔獵人，閃光彈，地雷，撞暈鬼，打頭，玩鬼累了還能直接帶加快修機速度的技能，讓鬼都沒獻祭到人就可以直接四逃離開，只要你點出很多技能，相信能在DBD找出一套適合你的玩鬼方式

總結優點:持續更新，不錯的畫面
總結缺點:人修機的速度太快了，而且沒有任何緩衝，頂多就是花10秒找圖騰拆圖騰，鬼的遊戲體驗極差，因此如果很常遇到很強的鬼，那不是鬼的強度太高，而是留下來陪你玩的鬼，只剩下那些強的老玩家了
Divertido, rápido, ideal para compartir con amigos. Un juego único en su genero que vale la pena jugarlo al 100%.
